title: Interactive Feedback Loop Simulator
description: Interactive simulation demonstrating how proportional controller gain K and plant time constant τ affect closed-loop step response. Students observe real-time changes in steady-state error, settling time, and response speed.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Control Systems
Engineering
Feedback Control
Proportional Control
topic: Closed-Loop Step Response and Proportional Control
learningObjectives: Demonstrate how changing K affects closed-loop response speed
Calculate steady-state error for a proportional control system
Predict settling time from system parameters
Explain why proportional control alone cannot eliminate steady-state error
